entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
